description: When the sexy Isaac Hardy suddenly starts having mechanical problems with his car he falls into a fantasy world that leads him on the path to his greatest sexual fantasy ever.He finds the help he needs from the very hot Brett Bradley. In this hot, testosterone-filled scene Brett cums to Isaac's rescue, fixing all his needs (and hunger) with a big hard tool. Watch these guys get down and greasy in this hot garage scene.
title: Braking Into Fantasy
